description: Try our easy to follow Sweet & Sour Pork & Pineapple With Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sweet & Sour Pork & Pineapple With Noodles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place noodles into a large bowl. Cover with boiling water and set aside for 3 minutes until softened. Separate with tongs, drain and reserve.
Meanwhile, reserving juice, drain pineapple pieces. Place juice into a small pan over medium heat. Stir in vinegar and sauces, and bring to the boil.
Mix cornflour with 1/3 cup water until smooth. Whisk into pineapple sauce mixture and cook for 1 minute. Remove from heat and set aside.
Heat half of the oil in a wok over mediumhigh heat. Cook pork, in batches, for 3 minutes or until golden. Transfer pork to a bowl and keep warm.

Heat remaining oil and cook onion and bok choy for 2 minutes. Add pork, pineapple pieces, sauce and noodles. Toss to combine everything and cook for 1 minute to reheat. Serve topped with coriander and chilli.
